      About Me

      This page is currently under construction, please visit here.

      I am a gameplay programmer that likes to program and design systems of any type of game. Usually with Unreal Engine 4/5, however, I am always open to learn new technology. I am providing a way for every one to learn and teach each other. Share your knowledge here.
